Planetary Orbital Evolution due to Tides
Orbital evolution of two objects experiencing tides

15  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::check_grid_range() const
16  {
17  if(
18  __track_masses.size() != 1
19  &&
20  __track_feh.size() != 1
21  &&
22  (
23  __mass < __track_masses[0]
24  ||
25  __mass > __track_masses[__track_masses.size() - 1]
26  ||
27  __feh < __track_feh[0]
28  ||
29  __feh > __track_feh[__track_feh.size() - 1]
30  )
31  ) {
32  std::ostringstream msg;
33  msg << "Stellar mass: "
34  << __mass
35  << " and [Fe/H]: "
36  << __feh
37  << " are outside the range of masses: "
38  << __track_masses[0]
39  << " - "
40  << __track_masses[__track_masses.size() - 1]
41  << " and [Fe/H]: "
42  << __track_feh[0]
43  << " - "
44  << __track_feh[__track_feh.size() - 1]
45  << " covered by the stellar evolution grid.";
46  throw Core::Error::BadFunctionArguments(msg.str());
47  }
48  }
49 
50  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::find_cell(
51  const std::valarray<double> &boundaries,
52  double value,
53  size_t &below_index,
54  size_t &above_index
55  ) const
56  {
57  const double *first_ptr = &boundaries[0],
58  *last_ptr = first_ptr + boundaries.size(),
59  *above_ptr = std::lower_bound(first_ptr,
60  last_ptr,
61  value),
62  *below_ptr = above_ptr;
63  if(boundaries.size() == 1) {
64  below_index = above_index = 0;
65  return;
66  }
67 #ifndef NDEBUG
68  if(above_ptr >= last_ptr )
69  std::cerr << "Value: "
70  << value
71  << " out of bounds: ["
72  << boundaries[0]
73  << ", "
74  << boundaries[boundaries.size() - 1]
75  << "]"
76  << std::endl;
77 #endif
78 
79  assert( above_ptr < last_ptr );
80 
81  if( value < *below_ptr) --below_ptr;
82 #ifndef NDEBUG
83  if(*above_ptr < value)
84  std::cerr << "Value: " << value
85  << " not in [" << *below_ptr << ", " << *above_ptr << "]"
86  << std::endl;
87 #endif
88  assert(*above_ptr >= value);
89  assert(value >= *below_ptr);
90  below_index = below_ptr - first_ptr;
91  above_index = above_ptr - first_ptr;
92  }
93 
94  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::set_interp_age_ranges()
95  {
96  size_t track_i = 0;
97  for(
98  size_t feh_i = 0;
99  feh_i < __track_feh.size();
100  ++feh_i
101  ) {
102  double track_feh = __track_feh[feh_i];
103  for(
104  size_t mass_i = 0;
105  mass_i < __track_masses.size();
106  ++mass_i
107  ) {
108  double track_mass = __track_masses[mass_i];
109  double min_track_age =
110  __evolution_tracks[track_i]->range_low(),
111  max_track_age =
112  __evolution_tracks[track_i]->range_high();
113  if(__log_age) {
114  min_track_age = std::exp(min_track_age);
115  max_track_age = std::exp(max_track_age);
116  }
117  __min_interp_ages[track_i] = interp_param_to_age(
118  age_to_interp_param(min_track_age,
119  track_mass,
120  track_feh)
121  );
122  __max_interp_ages[track_i] = interp_param_to_age(
123  age_to_interp_param(max_track_age,
124  track_mass,
125  track_feh)
126  );
127 #ifndef NDEBUG
128  std::cerr << "Track "
129  << track_i
130  << " age range: ["
131  << __min_interp_ages[track_i]
132  << ", "
133  << __max_interp_ages[track_i]
134  << "]"
135  << std::endl;
136 #endif
137  ++track_i;
138  }
139  }
140  }
141 
142  double EvolvingStellarQuantity::evaluate_track(
143  double age,
144  const OneArgumentDiffFunction &track,
145  const FunctionDerivatives **derivatives
146  ) const
147  {
148  double track_argument = (__log_age ? std::log(age) : age);
149  if(track_argument < track.range_low()) {
150  assert(std::abs(track_argument - track.range_low())
151  <
152  1e-8 * std::abs(track_argument));
153  track_argument = track.range_low();
154  }
155 
156  if(derivatives) {
157  *derivatives = new RemoveLogDeriv(
158  (__log_age ? age : NaN),
159  false,
160  track.deriv(track_argument),
161  true
162  );
163  return (*derivatives)->order(0);
164  } else return track(track_argument);
165  }
166 
167  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::check_grid_expansion_directions(
168  AllowedGridGrowth &grow,
169  double age
170  ) const
171  {
172  if(__min_interp_mass_index == 0)
173  grow.block_lighter();
174  if(__max_interp_mass_index == __track_masses.size())
175  grow.block_heavier();
176  if(__min_interp_feh_index == 0)
177  grow.block_poorer();
178  if(__max_interp_feh_index == __track_feh.size())
179  grow.block_richer();
180 
181  for(
182  size_t feh_index = __min_interp_feh_index;
183  (
184  (grow.lighter() || grow.heavier())
185  &&
186  feh_index < __max_interp_feh_index
187  );
188  ++feh_index
189  ) {
190  if(
191  grow.lighter()
192  &&
193  !track_in_range(__min_interp_mass_index - 1,
194  feh_index,
195  age)
196  )
197  grow.block_lighter();
198 
199  if(
200  grow.heavier()
201  &&
202  !track_in_range(__max_interp_mass_index,
203  feh_index,
204  age)
205  )
206  grow.block_heavier();
207  }
208 
209  for(
210  size_t mass_index = __min_interp_mass_index;
211  (
212  (grow.poorer() || grow.richer())
213  &&
214  mass_index < __max_interp_mass_index
215  );
216  ++mass_index
217  ) {
218  if(
219  grow.poorer()
220  &&
221  !track_in_range(mass_index,
222  __min_interp_feh_index - 1,
223  age)
224  )
225  grow.block_poorer();
226  if(
227  grow.richer()
228  &&
229  !track_in_range(mass_index,
230  __max_interp_feh_index,
231  age)
232  )
233  grow.block_richer();
234  }
235  }
236 
237  bool EvolvingStellarQuantity::expand_grid(const AllowedGridGrowth &grow,
238  double age) const
239  {
240  if(
241  grow.lighter()
242  &&
243  track_in_range(__min_interp_mass_index - 1,
244  std::max(size_t(1),
245  __min_interp_feh_index) - 1,
246  age)
247  &&
248  track_in_range(__min_interp_mass_index - 1,
249  std::min(__track_feh.size() - 1,
250  __max_interp_feh_index),
251  age)
252  ) {
253  --__min_interp_mass_index;
254  return true;
255  }
256 
257  if(
258  grow.heavier()
259  &&
260  track_in_range(__max_interp_mass_index,
261  std::max(size_t(1),
262  __min_interp_feh_index) - 1,
263  age)
264  &&
265  track_in_range(__max_interp_mass_index,
266  std::min(__track_feh.size() - 1,
267  __max_interp_feh_index),
268  age)
269  ) {
270  ++__max_interp_mass_index;
271  return true;
272  }
273 
274  if(
275  grow.poorer()
276  &&
277  track_in_range(std::max(size_t(1), __min_interp_mass_index) - 1,
278  __min_interp_feh_index - 1,
279  age)
280  &&
281  track_in_range(std::min(__max_interp_mass_index,
282  __track_masses.size() - 1),
283  __min_interp_feh_index - 1,
284  age)
285  ) {
286  --__min_interp_feh_index;
287  return true;
288  }
289 
290  if(
291  grow.richer()
292  &&
293  track_in_range(std::max(size_t(1), __min_interp_mass_index) - 1,
294  __max_interp_feh_index,
295  age)
296  &&
297  track_in_range(std::min(__max_interp_mass_index,
298  __track_masses.size() - 1),
299  __max_interp_feh_index,
300  age)
301  ) {
302  ++__max_interp_feh_index;
303  return true;
304  }
305 
306  std::valarray<size_t> padding(4);
307  padding[0] = __min_interp_mass_index - __mass_index_below;
308  padding[1] = (__min_interp_feh_index
309  -
310  __feh_index_below);
311  padding[2] =
312  __max_interp_feh_index - __feh_index_above - 1;
313  padding[3] = __max_interp_mass_index - __mass_index_above - 1;
314 
315  if(grow.lighter() && padding[0] == padding.min()) {
316  --__min_interp_mass_index;
317  return true;
318  }
319  padding[0] = std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
320  if(grow.poorer() && padding[1] == padding.min()) {
321  --__min_interp_feh_index;
322  return true;
323  }
324  padding[1] = std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max();
325  if(grow.richer() && padding[2] == padding.min()) {
326  ++__max_interp_feh_index;
327  return true;
328  }
329  if(grow.heavier()) {
330  ++__max_interp_mass_index;
331  return true;
332  }
333  return false;
334  }
335 
336  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::update_interpolation_grid() const
337  {
338  std::vector<double>::const_iterator
339  lower_age = __next_grid_change_age;
340  if(__next_grid_change_age == __interp_grid_change_ages.begin()) {
341  assert(__initially_zero);
342  __min_interp_mass_index = 0;
343  __max_interp_mass_index = 0;
344  __min_interp_feh_index = 0;
345  __max_interp_feh_index = 0;
346  __interp_masses.setlength(0);
347  __interp_feh.setlength(0);
348  return;
349  }
350  --lower_age;
351  double age = 0.5 * (*lower_age + *__next_grid_change_age);
352 
353  if(__min_interp_ages.max() < age && __max_interp_ages.min() > age) {
354  __min_interp_mass_index = 0;
355  __max_interp_mass_index = __track_masses.size();
356  __min_interp_feh_index = 0;
357  __max_interp_feh_index = __track_feh.size();
358  } else {
359 
360  AllowedGridGrowth grow;
361 
362  if(__mass_index_above == __mass_index_below)
363  grow.block_lighter().block_heavier();
364  if(__feh_index_above == __feh_index_below)
365  grow.block_poorer().block_richer();
366 
367  __max_interp_mass_index = __mass_index_above + 1;
368  __min_interp_mass_index = __mass_index_below;
369  __max_interp_feh_index = __feh_index_above + 1;
370  __min_interp_feh_index = __feh_index_below;
371  while(grow) {
372  check_grid_expansion_directions(grow, age);
373  if(grow && !expand_grid(grow, age)) break;
374  }
375  }
376 
377  __interp_masses.setcontent(
378  __max_interp_mass_index - __min_interp_mass_index,
379  &__track_masses[__min_interp_mass_index]
380  );
381  __interp_feh.setcontent(
382  __max_interp_feh_index - __min_interp_feh_index,
383  &__track_feh[__min_interp_feh_index]
384  );
385  }
386 
387  double EvolvingStellarQuantity::interpolate(
388  double age,
389  const FunctionDerivatives **derivatives
390  ) const
391  {
392  if(age < __min_age && __initially_zero) {
393  if(derivatives) *derivatives=new Core::ZeroDerivatives;
394  return 0.0;
395  }
396 #ifndef NDEBUG
397  if(age < __min_age || age > __max_age)
398  std::cerr << "Age: " << age
399  << " not in [" << __min_age << ", " << __max_age << "]"
400  << std::endl;
401 #endif
402  assert(__min_age <= age && age <= __max_age);
403  assert(__next_grid_change_age != __interp_grid_change_ages.begin());
404 #ifndef NDEBUG
405  std::vector<double>::const_iterator
406  lower_age = __next_grid_change_age;
407  --lower_age;
408  assert(*lower_age <= age && age <= *__next_grid_change_age);
409 #endif
410 
411  double interp_param = age_to_interp_param(age);
412  size_t num_interp_tracks = (
413  (__max_interp_feh_index - __min_interp_feh_index)
414  *
415  (__max_interp_mass_index - __min_interp_mass_index)
416  );
417  alglib::real_1d_array track_values;
418  track_values.setlength(num_interp_tracks);
419  std::vector<const FunctionDerivatives *>
420  *track_derivatives
421  =
422  new std::vector<const FunctionDerivatives *>(num_interp_tracks);
423  size_t value_index = 0;
424  for(
425  size_t feh_index = __min_interp_feh_index;
426  feh_index < __max_interp_feh_index;
427  ++feh_index
428  ) {
429  double
430  track_feh = __track_feh[feh_index];
431  for(
432  size_t mass_index = __min_interp_mass_index;
433  mass_index < __max_interp_mass_index;
434  ++mass_index
435  ) {
436  double track_mass = __track_masses[mass_index];
437  double track_age = interp_param_to_age(interp_param,
438  track_mass,
439  track_feh);
440  track_values[value_index] = evaluate_track(
441  track_age,
442  *__evolution_tracks[track_index(mass_index,
443  feh_index)],
444  (derivatives
445  ? &((*track_derivatives)[value_index])
446  : NULL)
447  );
448  ++value_index;
449  }
450  }
451  if(derivatives == NULL) {
452  double result = mass_feh_interp(__interp_masses,
453  __interp_feh,
454  track_values,
455  __mass,
456  __feh);
457  delete track_derivatives;
458  return (__log_quantity ? std::exp(result) : result);
459  } else {
460  *derivatives = new InterpolatedDerivatives(
461  __mass,
462  __feh,
463  track_derivatives,
464  __interp_masses,
465  __interp_feh,
466  NaN,
467  __log_quantity,
468  true
469  );
470  return (*derivatives)->order(0);
471  }
472  }
473 
474  double EvolvingStellarQuantity::age_to_interp_param(
475  double age,
476  double mass,
477  double feh
478  ) const
479  {
480  //t * (1.0 + (t / 5.0) * m**5 * 10.0**(-0.2*feh))* m**2.3 * 10.0**(-0.4*feh)
481  double feh_factor = std::pow(10.0, -feh / 5.0);
482  return std::log(
483  age
484  *
485  (1.0 + age / 5.0 * std::pow(mass, 5) * feh_factor)
486  *
487  std::pow(mass, 2.3)
488  *
489  std::pow(feh_factor, 2)
490  );
491  }
492 
493  double EvolvingStellarQuantity::interp_param_to_age(
494  double interp_param,
495  double mass,
496  double feh
497  ) const
498  {
499  double feh_factor = std::pow(10.0, -feh / 5.0),
500  c = (std::exp(interp_param)
501  *
502  std::pow(mass, -2.3)
503  /
504  std::pow(feh_factor, 2)),
505  a = 0.2 * std::pow(mass, 5) * feh_factor,
506  discr = 1.0 + 4.0 * a * c;
507  return (std::sqrt(discr) - 1.0) / (2.0 * a);
508  }
509 
510  EvolvingStellarQuantity::EvolvingStellarQuantity(
511  double mass,
512  double feh,
513  const std::valarray<double> &track_masses,
514  const std::valarray<double> &track_feh,
515  const std::vector<const OneArgumentDiffFunction *> &evolution_tracks,
516  bool log_age,
517  bool log_quantity,
518  bool starts_zero
519  ) :
520  __mass(mass),
521  __feh(feh),
522  __log_age(log_age),
523  __log_quantity(log_quantity),
524  __initially_zero(starts_zero),
525  __track_masses(track_masses),
526  __track_feh(track_feh),
527  __min_interp_ages(evolution_tracks.size()),
528  __max_interp_ages(evolution_tracks.size()),
529  __evolution_tracks(evolution_tracks)
530  {
531 #ifndef NDEBUG
532  std::cerr << "Creating quantity with mass: " << mass
533  << ", [Fe/H]: " << feh << std::endl
534  << ", with track masses: " << track_masses << std::endl
535  << " and track [Fe/H]: " << track_feh << std::endl
536  << " with " << evolution_tracks.size() << " tracks"
537  << std::endl;
538 #endif
539 
540  assert(evolution_tracks.size() == (track_masses.size()
541  *
542  track_feh.size()));
543  check_grid_range();
544  set_interp_age_ranges();
545 
546  if(starts_zero) {
547  __interp_grid_change_ages.reserve(2 * evolution_tracks.size()
548  +
549  1);
550  __interp_grid_change_ages.insert(__interp_grid_change_ages.end(),
551  -Core::Inf);
552 
553  } else {
554  __interp_grid_change_ages.reserve(2 * evolution_tracks.size());
555  }
556  __interp_grid_change_ages.insert(
557  __interp_grid_change_ages.end(),
558  &__min_interp_ages[0],
559  &__min_interp_ages[0] + __min_interp_ages.size()
560  );
561  __interp_grid_change_ages.insert(
562  __interp_grid_change_ages.end(),
563  &__max_interp_ages[0],
564  &__max_interp_ages[0] + __max_interp_ages.size()
565  );
566 
567  std::sort(__interp_grid_change_ages.begin(),
568  __interp_grid_change_ages.end());
569  std::unique(__interp_grid_change_ages.begin(),
570  __interp_grid_change_ages.end());
571  __next_grid_change_age = __interp_grid_change_ages.end();
572 
573  find_cell(__track_masses,
574  mass,
575  __mass_index_below,
576  __mass_index_above);
577  find_cell(__track_feh,
578  feh,
579  __feh_index_below,
580  __feh_index_above);
581 
582  __min_age = __min_interp_ages[
583  track_index(__mass_index_below, __feh_index_below)
584  ];
585  __max_age = __max_interp_ages[
586  track_index(__mass_index_below, __feh_index_below)
587  ];
588  __min_age = std::max(
589  __min_age,
590  __min_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_above,
591  __feh_index_below)]
592  );
593  __max_age = std::min(
594  __max_age,
595  __max_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_above,
596  __feh_index_below)]
597  );
598 
599  __min_age = std::max(
600  __min_age,
601  __min_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_below,
602  __feh_index_above)]
603  );
604  __max_age = std::min(
605  __max_age,
606  __max_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_below,
607  __feh_index_above)]
608  );
609 
610  __min_age = std::max(
611  __min_age,
612  __min_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_above,
613  __feh_index_above)]
614  );
615  __max_age = std::min(
616  __max_age,
617  __max_interp_ages[track_index(__mass_index_above,
618  __feh_index_above)]
619  );
620  }
621 
622  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::select_interpolation_region(double age)
623  const
624  {
625 #ifndef NDEBUG
626  std::cerr << "Finding interpolation region for age = "
627  << age
628  << ", grid change ages: "
629  << std::endl;
630  for(
631  std::vector<double>::const_iterator
632  change_age_i = __interp_grid_change_ages.begin();
633  change_age_i != __interp_grid_change_ages.end();
634  ++change_age_i
635  )
636  std::cerr << "\t" << *change_age_i << std::endl;
637 #endif
638 
639 
640  std::vector<double>::const_iterator new_grid_change_age =
641  std::upper_bound(
642  __interp_grid_change_ages.begin(),
643  __interp_grid_change_ages.end(),
644  age
645  );
646  if(__next_grid_change_age != new_grid_change_age) {
647  __next_grid_change_age = new_grid_change_age;
648  assert(__next_grid_change_age
649  !=
650  __interp_grid_change_ages.end());
651  update_interpolation_grid();
652  }
653  }
654 
655  const FunctionDerivatives *EvolvingStellarQuantity::deriv(double age)
656  const
657  {
658  const FunctionDerivatives *deriv;
659  interpolate(age, &deriv);
660  return deriv;
661  }
662 
663  double EvolvingStellarQuantity::previous_discontinuity() const
664  {
665  if(__next_grid_change_age == __interp_grid_change_ages.begin()) {
666  assert(__initially_zero);
667  return -Core::Inf;
668  }
669  std::vector<double>::const_iterator result = __next_grid_change_age;
670  return *(--result);
671  }
672 
673  void EvolvingStellarQuantity::enable_next_interpolation_region() const
674  {
675  assert(__next_grid_change_age != __interp_grid_change_ages.end());
676  ++__next_grid_change_age;
677  update_interpolation_grid();
678  }
